attributes.background: As a child with a family who is making enough money to give me 3 meals a day it makes me sad to see people not being able to eat at school and it would be fair for everyone to have free school meals and to all be treated equally

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Increase free school meal budget for all schools:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643288
